mosinstall.name: Your Cart Module
mosinstall.author: Soeren Eberhardt
mosinstall.description: Shows the Cart for your Customers

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: vmShowQuantity
param.label: Display Quantity
param.description: Select whether to Display the quantity

param.name: vmShowName
param.label: Display Name
param.description: Select whether to Display the name

param.name: vmShowAttrib
param.label: Display Attributes
param.description: Select whether to Display the Attributes

param.name: vmShowPrice
param.label: Display Price
param.description: Select whether to Display the Price

param.name: vmAlignPrice
param.label: Align Price to the right
param.description: Select whether to Align the Price

param.name: vmShowEmptyCart
param.label: Display - Your cart is empty
param.description: Select whether to Display your cart is empty

param.name: vmShowLogo
param.label: Display VirtueMart Logo on empty cart
param.description: Select whether to Display VirtueMart logo includes link to VirtueMart site

param.name: vmEnableEmptyCart
param.label: Enable function to empty cart
param.description: Select whether to enable empty cart feature

param.name: vmEnableGreyBox
param.label: Display Cart in Grey Box
param.description: Select whether to display the cart in a grey box
